VIK.short-description: VIK School is an app that replaces the traditional way of teaching civics.

list.1: Development of a React Native application
list.2: Creation of a teacher dashboard to manage children in their class
list.3: Creation of an Admin dashboard to monitor the app's progress
list.4: Creation of an automatic notification system to increase children's engagement
list.6: Maintenance and development of the backend in Node.js + Express

otacon.short-description: Otacon is a consulting company that develops internal and customer software.

list.1: Creation of an automatic PDF daily report with data from the real world
list.2: Creation of an AI comment moderator for negative comments filtering
